content: the lace headscarf pattern uses a leaf-shaped motif nestled in a staggered diamond pattern the scarf is knitted from the bottom-up with an increase of 2 stitches on every odd-numbered row in general odd-numbered row are knitted while even-numbered row are purled no gauge will be provided as the gauge is entirely customisable based on your preference sizing is entirely dependent on your preference as well and can be personalised by adding/ reducing the number of row
